oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Stamps Quartet - American Beauty Flour #9 and #10 - 1947-06-25
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of the Stamp Quartet (musical group) performing a variety of gospel tunes. The broadcast is sponsored by the American Beauty Flour. The show is hosted by Roy George (entertainer). The broadcast is recorded at the KWHI radio station in Brenham, Texas. The recording is listed as show number nine and ten. The recording is from June 25, 1947.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Stamps Quartet; Roy George
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Roy George performs an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (00:07) American Beauty Flour Theme (Stamps Quartet) -- (00:23) George introduces Frank Stamps -- (00:38) Stamps greets the audience -- (01:03) Singing of the Glory Song (Stamps Quartet) -- (03:10) George performs an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (04:09) Love Leads the Way (Stamps Quartet) -- (07:47) Stamp performs an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (08:23) Death Will Never Knock on Heaven's Door (Stamps Quartet) -- (11:24) He Knows How (Stamps Quartet) -- (12:23) George and Stamp perform an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (12:52) American Beauty Flour Theme (Stamps Quartet) -- (13:13) George performs an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (13:20) American Beauty Flour Theme (Stamps Quartet) -- (13:35) George introduces Stamps -- (13:50) Stamps greets the audience -- (14:06) The Lord is With Me (Stamps Quartet) -- (16:56) George performs an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (17:51) I Want to be Ready to Meet Him (Stamps Quartet) -- (20:14) I've Made a Covenant With My Lord (Stamps Quartet) -- (23:03) Stamp performs an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (23:32) You'd Better be Somewhere Praying (Stamp Quartet) -- (25:31) George and Stamp perform an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (25:58) American Beauty Flour Theme (Stamps Quartet)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Stamps Quartet; George, Roy;
